description:
cmd/pack: support removing of leading file prefix on windows

Fixes issue 5550

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/11904043/diff/5001/src/cmd/pack/ar.c

https://codereview.appspot.com/11904043/diff/5001/src/cmd/pack/ar.c#newcode1624
src/cmd/pack/ar.c:1624: *	checks if p is start of windows full path, like C:\ or c:/.
s/checks/check/ for consistency

https://codereview.appspot.com/11904043/diff/5001/src/cmd/pack/ar.c#newcode1625
src/cmd/pack/ar.c:1625: *	returns 1 if so. also sets drive parameter to its
s/returns/return/
s/sets/set/
